name: Advanced Fortune

name: Combat Mastery

name: Mastery of Pain

name: Advanced Sorcery

name: Mastery of Magic
description: Increases mana pool and regeneration of all towers by [color=GOLD]2.5%[/color].

name: Loot Mastery

name: Advanced Wisdom
description: Increases experience gain of all towers by [color=GOLD]2.5%[/color].
